cards_description:
Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000
                species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica

title.0: Y A R O S L A V
title.1: P A S H I N S K I J

profile.description: Greetings! My name is Yaroslav, I am 23 years old and I actively learning and developing in the frontend development. At the moment I am looking for a suitable vacancy that will provide me with a rapid growth and decent pay. I am a goal oriented and hard working person. I got my skills in this direction by working in my previous company, as well as passing various courses and self-development.

experience.title: EXPERIENCE
experience.0: Adaptive cross-browser layout of websites and landing pages
experience.1: Creation of sites on React, NextJS, Typescript, Redux, ThreeJS
experience.2: Most of the projects required the use of 3D models and graphics, for these purposes I used the ThreeJS library
experience.4: Uploading applications to Amazon server (AWS) using pm2
